title: Game won't show
body: When I try to play any match in League, whether tutorial or otherwise, the game just shows a black screen on the loading screen and throughout the match and it says "Cannot display video mode" what does this mean and please help

replies.body:
What happens if you tap Alt+Enter while on this black screen?  Could be a resolution problem.  A config reset could help, but test it in a custom first:

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings.
